block.p: An article on Monday about Phillips Exeter Academy's decision to let gay and lesbian couples serve as dormitory parents misstated the academy's age ranking among prep schools. Exeter, chartered in 1781, is not the country's oldest. According to the National Association of Independent Schools, the oldest is Collegiate School in New York City, founded in 1628. Governor Dummer Academy in Byfield, Mass., founded in 1763, is the nation's oldest boarding school.
